testimonials.subtitle: What our partners say about Altama

1.quote: During my time working at PT Altama Surya Anugerah, I have gained many valuable new experiences. I started my career as a Mechanical Staff assigned to a branch Service Center, and now I have been promoted and given the opportunity to participate in the ALeAP program. Through ALeAP, I have gained even more experience and faced various challenges that have trained me to adapt and grow. This journey has prepared me well and made me more confident and ready to take on my new position in the future.
1.name: Wilman Dwi Maulana

3.quote: For 24 years, I have been part of this company and have witnessed so many journeys, challenges, changes, and achievements. A comfortable work environment, warm and family-oriented colleagues, and a solid team have created many meaningful moments for me. Thank you, Altama.
3.name: Sri Wahyuni

4.quote: Five meaningful years.
